pages.text: The idea of fermenting $(l:magical_blocks/titration_barrel#kimchi)food$(/l) and $(l:magical_items/infused_beverages)drinks$(/l) in $(l:general/colored_trees#colored_wood)Colored Wood$(/l) was not far away. Over time, the properties of the wood influences contents.$(br)The results are sometimes more, sometimes less delicious, but always interesting. (On the other hand, the last could of course also be due to your cooking skills)$(br)Holds up to a stack of items and 1 bucket of liquid.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)When you blink and it felt like the world stopped existing? Each time that happens, the barrel fermentation process seems to have advanced.

pages.title: The Art of Brewing
pages.text: Fermentation is a very natural thing. Like most natural things, things take time and care. And since it's not a fully controlled environment there are a lot of variables to it.$(li)Time: Time, of course, being the most important ingredient. While some beverages only seeming to get more intense after more time, others go bad eventually

$(li)Temperature: The hotter it is, the more of your precious content simply evaporates over time. This is called the Angel's Share$(li)Humidity: The more humid the air, the more water evaporates in comparison to alcohol, making the drink stronger$(li)Water Share: The ratio of ingredients to water is a fine balance, but one to be played with. A higher share of ingredients make the drinks ferment a bit faster, albeit at the cost of shorter status effect durations

pages.title: Kimchi
pages.text: Fermentation is not for drinks alone! Made from 3 different vegetables, Kimchi is a hearty dish, best served as a side.

pages.title: Clotted Cream
pages.text: Slightly fermented, it still keeps the properties of $(thing)Milk$(). Eating will remove currently active Status Effects.

pages.title: Fresh Chocolate
pages.text: A great snack, literally: biting off a piece is quick and even makes you reasonably full.$(br)Pleasantly sweet and fruity.

pages.title: Bodacious Berry Bar
pages.text: A elaborate to create feast of flavor that guarantees to make your mouth water.

pages.title: Hot Chocolate
pages.text: Perfect to come to the calm and in the cold season.

pages.title: Pure Alcohol
pages.text: Your memory isn't always up to snuff. Somehow you ended up with this bottle. Definitely got a little stronger than planned...$(br)More to disinfect than to drink.
